body.name: Brightech Sky LED Floor lamp, Torchiere Super Bright Floor Lamp for Living Rooms & Offices - Dimmable, Tall Standing Lamp for Bedroom Reading - Platinum Silver
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins
features: Super Bright LED Lighting: Brightech floor lamp built-in LED light with 2190 Lumens is enough to light your living room. Powered with 26 watts LED lights, the floor lamp generates 3000K warm white colors. Whether you want to read, write or simply relax, the standing lamp provides ample illumination without straining the eyes. The lamp cord extends just over 7 ½ feet, an ideal floor lamp for living room, bedroom.

Stable and Safe: Safety is paramount, the modern floor lamp's durable sturdiness makes it ideal for playrooms too, the felt-covered 8 pound weighted base means children or pets can't tip it over. No need to worry about the overheating issue, since the tall lamp comes with premium LED beads, the dimmable LED floor lamp will keep cool even after a long time of use.

Long-lasting and Energy-saving: These integrated LEDs are rated to last 20 years (assuming 3 hours use/day) because they don't waste energy like halogen, CFL and incandescent bulbs. Energy-efficient led lights can help you reduce electricity bills, built-in LED lights save your time replacing them. Save money with the Brightech Sky.

3-Way Dimmer and Memory Mode: The contemporary living room decor fits easily in corners and the base slides under sofas. Adjust brightness level with a simple touch of a button featuring three dimmer settings with this LED floor lamp. The rotating head of this tall lamp lets you angle the light for a greater light effect when desired. The standing lamp has a memory function to remember your last brightness setting when you turn the lamp on and works with wall switches.

THE WARRANTY: Unlike other brands, our floor lamps are built to last, and we stand behind that. That's why Brightech USA offers an industry-leading 3-year warranty covering defects, malfunctions, or sudden failures to your standing lamp when purchased through us. Thanks to our friendly USA-based support team, you'll rest easy knowing your floor lamp has the backing you can trust.

A contemporary upright design that fits into art deco and mid-century modern spaces.

Stable and Safe A weighted base helps prevent tipping, so kids and pets won’t easily knock the LED floor lamp over. Adjustable Head The adjustable head on the table lamp lets you point it wherever you want to amplify the light where you need it. Long Lasting Built-in LEDs 20-Year Life & Energy-Saving LED Bulb offers sustainability and energy efficiency. It reduces your carbon footprint and saves you money on bills.

Perfect for Any Task The Sky LED Torchiere is an excellent gift for students, mothers, fathers, partners, spouses, children, kids, or parents for Back to School, Off to College, Graduation, Christmas, Birthday, Winter Holiday, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Wedding, Anniversary and Business Achievement.

Sophisticated Serenity, Adjust the Brightness to Your Mood The Sky LED Torchiere - this bright floor lamp is perfect for any mood or task. Bounce light off the wall for ambient lighting or focus over your shoulder while you write your autobiography because you’ll be famous one day. Place this bright lamp in any room; it could be life-changing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this lamp for two years now, and I’m so glad I bought it. It was easy to assemble the body of the lamp, it works great, and because the body of the lamp is so thin it can fit anywhere. We originally bought it to go in our kitchen until our overhead light could be fixed, but now we use it to add extra light near our couch. The LED panel is very bright on its highest setting, but it can be turned down if you don’t need it as bright. It’s absolutely worth the money, and if something happens to our lamp I’m definitely getting another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Lamp!
reviews.reviewText: *First, the review stars talk about a remote control - mine did not come with one, just FYI. If it's referring to the dimmer switch, that is five stars.*My 13 yo son put this together for me in less than ten minutes. It's an amazing lamp and I would buy this for more rooms if I needed to. The slim profile makes is gorgeous and goes with my modern farmhouse aesthetic. The dimmer options are great to change the mood of the room and adjust for lighting for TV time. The highest option is bright and can light up an entire room. The dimmer is sensitive too which I like because you don't have to put much effort into turning the light on.I was a bit hesitant to purchase it because of the price - like would it be worth it - and I would definitely say yes it's worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Philips Hue Smart Plug
reviews.reviewText: Almost didn't buy it when it sounded like it might not work with a smart plug but gave it a go and its been a week now and it works great with a Philips Hue Smart Plug. I also had an extra amazon smart plug from after putting the Christmas tree away and tried that and that also works. Very nice bright, warm white light. No buzzing. Sturdy and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars missing remote control
reviews.reviewText: Brightech Sky LED Torchiere is a great light. It is easy to set up and, not even 5 minutes.-Pros: The delivery was quick and packaging was secure. Set up was a breeze, easy to follow directions and no tools involved. The color and finish is very nice. I got the bronze. The brightness of the lamp is great, it almost lights up my whole living room which is quite large- over 25 ft long. The fixture itself is non obtrusive, which I like.-Cons: The head of the lamp is flimsy. It doesn't angle to direct the light in all directions and when it does angle it is minimal. My fear is that the head will break off. Also the switch to dim the light and to turn off on is so sensitive, my concern is that it will easily become defective. Also, I did not receive the remote with this item. I would prefer to use remote than the switch to dim the light or turn off and on.I will be contacting the seller to request they send the remote.I really like this lamp over all. I will use it for a month or two and if it holds up I will purchase two more for the other rooms in my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is well designed and attractively casts an aura of warmth in a small space of the living room in a corner than was dim. However, the top (the light itself) swivels not very much side to side as I hoped it would, so it doesn’t do much good for reading, just for ambiance., as it can only be aimed higher up toward the wall and ceiling. Regardless, it is a lovely modern streamlined light and easy to assemble, as advertised! I especially like the dimmable feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives off plenty of light
reviews.reviewText: I liked this lamp so much that I bought a second one. They look clean and sleek, have multiple brightness settings and really light up a whole room. They're super easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you’re having doubts don’t! 😆 I don’t regret getting this at all! “The Sky” is a very appropriate name for this lamp! It is so bright, and lights up the whole living room. It’s very classic looking and even dims! The power button is a touch, and it’s very easy to assemble. Only takes about 5 mins to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Currently, I own 5 of these lamps, which provide great lighting at a reasonable price. I don't have a remote and don't know if one is made for this floorlamp. I like the lamp's slender design, which makes it easy to move. Although the lamp has multiple brightness settings, I always use the highest, and it provides excellent illumination for any room in my house. If a smaller version of the lamp were available for bedroom end tables, I would also purchase them.

reviews.reviewTitle: I keep calling this the "Sun" lamp, not "Sky" lamp
reviews.reviewText: So bright! Which is great, as sometimes I need a lot more lot than the single-bulb, almost-century-old ceiling light fixture in this room can provide. I keep calling this the "Sun" lamp when it is on its highest setting. Nice stepdown between the 3 brightness levels. Lowest is good ambient light, middle good for most everyday lighting needs, highest for when you really need to see well. Very simple and quick to put together, took maybe 5 minutes. The midcentury-inspired brass finish is a lovely touch, and the slim profile means it fits into some fairly tight spaces. Might pick up a second one for another room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Seems well made and easy to put together.The tilt on the head is limited, it rotates around but mainly faces up.Two pin flat bladed plug, it doesn't say this in the specifications.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy práctica, no ocupa mucho lugar
reviews.reviewText: Buen precio y es tal como aparece anunciada. La recimiendo

This lamp was very easy to assemble and is simple but cute. It gives off beautiful lighting and at the highest level lights up the whole room. My only complaint is that it does get quite warm which they advertised it does not
